info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 2:12PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Teller and northwestern El Paso Counties through 245 PM MDT... At 211 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Woodland Park, or 20 miles northwest of Colorado Springs, moving east at 10 mph. Other showers and isolated thunderstorms were forming over the Air Force Academy and extending up to Monument. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Woodland Park around 215 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Monument, Air Force Academy, Palmer Lake and Gleneagle. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
